text: Mehrdad Afsharian Tarshiz (, born 31 October 1954) is an Iranian former cyclist. He competed in two events at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Iran Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Iran Category:Cyclists at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Cyclists at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games
title: Mehrdad Afsharian
